email.title: email
email.description: The email address of the user. Must be a valid email address.

firstName.title: firstName
firstName.description: The first name of the user.

lastName.title: lastName
lastName.description: The family name of the user.

messagingSessionId.title: messagingSessionId
messagingSessionId.description: The messagingSessionId of the current session.

shippingCity.title: shippingCity
shippingCity.description: The shipping city of the user.

shippingCountry.title: shippingCountry
shippingCountry.description: The shipping country for the user, must be a valid country name or country code. Please suggest a value if misspelt/invalid.

shippingPostCode.title: shippingPostCode
shippingPostCode.description: The shipping postal code or zip code of the user.

shippingState.title: shippingState
shippingState.description: The shipping state of the user, must be a valid state/province for the provided country.

shippingStreet.title: shippingStreet
shippingStreet.description: The shipping street of the user.

storeId.title: storeId
storeId.description: The storeId to use for the current order.
